start.speaker: Pixel
start.text: An RPG! Time to craft an epic adventure with story, characters, and battles!
start.followUp: Let's build your world scene by scene, starting with the title.

titleFantasyTheme.speaker: Pixel
titleFantasyTheme.text: First, what fantasy setting calls to you?

options.text: Medieval kingdom with castles and dragons
Mystical forest with magic and elves
Dark dungeon with monsters and treasure

titleMedievalAssets.speaker: Pixel
titleMedievalAssets.text: Medieval it is! Let's pick a majestic castle background.

titleForestAssets.speaker: Pixel
titleForestAssets.text: Mystical forest! Choose an enchanted woodland background.

titleDungeonAssets.speaker: Pixel
titleDungeonAssets.text: Dark and mysterious! Pick a dungeon entrance background.

titleHeroSilhouette.speaker: Pixel
titleHeroSilhouette.text: Your hero's silhouette will appear dramatically on the title. Choose your protagonist!

titleEpicMusic.speaker: Pixel
titleEpicMusic.text: RPGs need epic orchestral music! Pick your main theme.

characterCreation.speaker: Pixel
characterCreation.text: Character creation time! What class system should we use?

options.text: Expanded: Knight, Wizard, Archer, Cleric, Thief

characterStats.speaker: Pixel
characterStats.text: Stats define your hero! Which system works best?

options.text: Complex: STR, DEX, INT, WIS, CON, CHA

villageHub.speaker: Pixel
villageHub.text: Every RPG needs a home village! This is where adventures begin.
villageHub.followUp: Let's build your village hub with NPCs and shops.

villageBackground.speaker: Pixel
villageBackground.text: Pick a cozy village setting for your hub world.

villageNPCs.speaker: Pixel
villageNPCs.text: Villages need NPCs! Choose townspeople sprites.

villageShops.speaker: Pixel
villageShops.text: What shops should your village have?

options.text: Blacksmith, Alchemist, Magic Shop, Inn, Guild

questSystem.speaker: Pixel
questSystem.text: Quest time! How should players receive missions?

options.text: NPCs with speech bubbles and requests

battleSystem.speaker: Pixel
battleSystem.text: Combat is crucial in RPGs! Pick your battle style.

battleMusic.speaker: Pixel
battleMusic.text: Battle music gets the blood pumping! Pick your combat theme.

dungeonExploration.speaker: Pixel
dungeonExploration.text: Time to explore dungeons! How should they generate?

dungeonTreasure.speaker: Pixel
dungeonTreasure.text: Dungeons need treasure! Pick loot to discover.

bossBattle.speaker: Pixel
bossBattle.text: Every quest needs a final boss! Choose your big bad.

bossStrategy.speaker: Pixel
bossStrategy.text: How should the boss fight work?

endingChoice.speaker: Pixel
endingChoice.text: Your epic needs an ending! How should the story conclude?

options.text: Hero returns home as a legend
Sets up for a sequel adventure

endingCredits.speaker: Pixel
endingCredits.text: Pick triumphant ending music for your credits!

complete.speaker: Pixel
complete.text: ⚔️ LEGENDARY! Your RPG is complete! Title ✓ Character ✓ Village ✓ Quests ✓ Battles ✓ Boss ✓ Ending ✓
complete.followUp: An epic adventure awaits! Ready to embark?
